title: Gaza border crossing buzzes with activity after years of near-complete closure
description: Reopening the border crossing is a key step as the Israel-Hamas ceasefire moves ahead.
content: Reopening the border crossing is a key step as the Israel-Hamas ceasefire moves ahead.
